Key Match Events: Ja Morant took an and-1 on Gabe Vincent, then taunted the Laker with a 'too small' gesture.
LeBron James hit the same taunt right back at Morant.
Ja Morant injured his hamstring during a failed alley-oop attempt and was sidelined for the remainder of the second half.
Pre-Game Insights: The dislike between the Memphis Grizzlies and Los Angeles Lakers continues to grow.
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies took home the victory with a final score of 131-114.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies and the Lakers will meet again this month on November 13.
Ja Morant's clap back at LeBron James' trash talk went viral with over 570,000 views on X.
